data.title: Mitch Daniels - 49th Governor of Indiana - Biography
data.meta_description: See more about Mitch Daniels including contact information, employment history, related organizations and other biographical information.
data.text:
LegiStorm is constantly adding new information on the people, places and reports in our database. In the past week, LegiStorm added:

234 new people

86 new organizations

2160 job history records for people in our database

508 education records for people in our database

1576 contact addresses, emails and URLs (LinkedIn, Facebook, etc.)

4 new people through the revolving door

116 new policy reports

27 new trips to our privately funded travel database

355 new personal financial disclosures

7058 new press releases

44 new town halls
